description:
A 2 pack of quality Duracell batteries to power your favourite small devices.

  • Also known as: CR2016, DL2016, ECR2016, FA, SBT11, BR2016, 208-202, 208-204, 208-206, DL2016B, KCR2016, LM2016
  • 2 pack saves you a little money and the environment a little packaging
  • Guaranteed for 10 years in storage with Duracell’s Duralock Power Preserve™ Technology
  • Common application: Heartrate monitors, car alarm fobs, watches, bike computers, and cameras
name: Duracell 2016 3V Lithium 2 Pack
